title: golang.org: links to old download page
body:
At http://golang.org/doc/install and http://tip.golang.org/doc/install, a bunch of links
point to https://code.google.com/p/go/wiki/Downloads?tm=2, which then just directs the
user to golang.org/dl.  Seems like the links should all directly point to golang.org/dl.

It might also be better to link to "//golang.org/dl" instead of just
"/dl" so the link still works on tip.golang.org?  Or since the download links
are ultimately all over HTTPS anyway and SHA1 hashes aren't trustworthy over bare HTTP,
perhaps link directly to "https://golang.org/dl";?
